00032    /* 
00033    * Read data for one atom.
00034    */
00035    void McConfigIo::readAtom(std::istream &in, Atom& atom)
00036    {  
00037       in >> atom.position();
00038       boundary().shift(atom.position());
00039    }
00040 
00041    /* 
00042    * Write data for one atom.
00043    */
00044    void McConfigIo::writeAtom(std::ostream &out, const Atom& atom)
00045    {  out << atom.position() << std::endl; }
